release_notes:
Fix trailing digits on balances
Fix issue where signing up for a new account would not log the user in
Fix issue where signup errors would not be shown
Fix inaccurate display of small numbers in Send screen
Update titles of contact transactions
Provide additional insight to transaction errors
Caches computationally expensive BTC/RVN address calls

Fix broken margins on reset password and username modals
Fix issue where scanning QR could cause spinner lockups
Performance improvements on mnemonic generation and transaction fetching
Reverse recent activity in coin information page
Show full balance of wallet in detail view
Navigate to settings page on successful password update

[FIX] Do not show loading bar if mnemonic has not been created
[FIX] Stuck spinner on page loads
[FIX] Fix ETH transaction history updates, HOARD balance fetching
[NEW] pass release notes into slack on fastlane deployments

FIX change password warnings 
FIX Fix broken qr regex to allow for no params and space after 
FIX make sure pin store screen is within safe view
Rename Boar
Fix coin amount display
Fix testnet warnings

Mainnet build
Fixes keyboard "next" button and scrolling issues
Adjusts implementation of input error for better usability
Fixes Ravencoin mainnet address validation
Removes testnet warnings from splash screen
Adjusts loading bar animation

Mainnet build
Fixed Pin Input Screens styles
Fixed bug persisting old network transactions
Fixed recovery screen styles, next buttons

Mainnet build
Fixed inconsistent Pin Input Screens
Fixed auto-selecting next input field
Fixed keyboard covering inputs
Mainnet build setup and related bugfixes

Add Ravencoin wallet
